extendedInfo.description: Number game is a logic game where you have to clear the game field of all numbers. Numbers can be removed by tapping on them in pairs, if they are next to each other and match or add to 10. Illustrated game guide is inside the application.Sorry for the confusion about SMS permission. As we are located in a country that does not support payed android apps (or in-app payments), we have to use  http://www.fortumo.com carrier based billing for removing the ads in game. SMS is ONLY sent when you choose to remove the in-game ads and you have to confirm it before.

reviews.title: Great game! No worries about SMS
reviews.comment: The developer explains above that the SMS permission is for in-app purchases only. It\'s not like they are going to destroy their customer base by sending random texts from your  phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Access My Messages?
reviews.comment: Decent play, but no game needs to  have access to my messages! UNINSTALL!
reviews.author: Menachem Abramowitz

reviews.title: Uninstalled
reviews.comment: Would be good but it is TOO SLOW! The time it takes between touching the squares and them disappearing is too long. Fix this and I will probably reinstall.

reviews.title: Very Addictive!
reviews.comment: Great game! Needs no more permissionas that necessary (works without network too which is great). Numbers could be bigger a little bit. After last update it is very fast too. Here is my \342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205 :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice Game
reviews.comment: Only thing i find a bit downing that you cant combine first and last number of whole board.   Also would be nice to have a little information about how and when those additional boxes appear.  I figured that when you don\'t have any moves the amount of the unused numbers appear at the end.  Also i find that when you hit hint it starts searching for hints from beginning and displays first available, in my opinion it would be more appropriate to display that hint randomly.
